GSD.description:
nvme-pci: fix a NULL pointer dereference in nvme_alloc_admin_tags

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.121 by commit af98940dd33c9f9e1beb4f71c0a39260100e2a65. For more details please see the references link.
